contents:
205 Based Alberta woman talking about Indians taking over "They all need to go home, NOW. I don't want to see another fucking one of them. These people are lazy, corrupt, disgusting, and I want nothing to do with them in our goddamn country anymore. I've said what I've said." (rumble.com) posted 15 hours ago by 38WendysHamSquare79 12 comments award share report block
